osca_district1_annex1.name: Office for Senior Citizens Affairs (OSCA) - District 1 Annex I
osca_district1_annex1.address: G/F SP Building, Magallanes Street, Davao City
osca_district1_annex1.servicesOffered:
• Senior citizen ID processing
• Social pension assistance
• Health benefits coordination
• Community programs for seniors
• Legal assistance referrals
• Emergency financial aid
osca_district1_annex1.notes: Main office for senior citizen affairs in District 1

osca_main_office.name: OSCA Main Office
osca_main_office.address: Legislative Building, Sangguniang Panlungsod, Magallanes St., Davao City
osca_main_office.servicesOffered:
• Senior citizen ID processing
• Social pension distribution
• Health insurance assistance
• Community center activities
• Senior citizen discounts
• Transportation assistance
osca_main_office.notes: Main OSCA office for all districts

cswdo.name: City Social Welfare and Development Office (CSWDO)
cswdo.address: A. Pichon St. (behind City Hall Annex Building), Davao City
cswdo.servicesOffered:
• Social welfare programs
• Family assistance programs
• Child and youth services
• Women's protection services
• Community development programs
• Disaster relief assistance
cswdo.notes: Handles various social welfare programs for all age groups

cssdo.name: City Social Services and Development Office (CSSDO)
cssdo.address: A. Pichon St., at back of City Hall Annex Building, Davao City
cssdo.contact: Contact: (082) 225-0417; also uses same numbers as CSWDO sometimes; handles programs for older persons, PWDs etc.
cssdo.servicesOffered:
• Programs for older persons
• Programs for persons with disabilities (PWDs)
• Community-based rehabilitation
• Livelihood assistance
• Skills training programs
• Social case management
cssdo.notes: Specializes in programs for older persons and PWDs

dswd_region_xi.name: DSWD Region XI (Field Office / Regional Office)
dswd_region_xi.address: Ramon Magsaysay Avenue corner D. Suazo Street, Davao City
dswd_region_xi.servicesOffered:
• Pantawid Pamilyang Pilipino Program (4Ps)
• Social Pension for Indigent Senior Citizens
• Sustainable Livelihood Program
• Protective Services Program
• Disaster Response Operations
• Kalahi-CIDSS Program

barangay_1a_poblacion.name: Barangay 1-A Poblacion (Local Barangay Office)
barangay_1a_poblacion.address: Bolton / Magallanes Street, Poblacion, Davao City
barangay_1a_poblacion.contact: Office hours Mon-Fri 8 AM-5 PM; useful for local/resident-level services (barangay cert, etc.)
barangay_1a_poblacion.servicesOffered:
• Barangay clearance
• Certificate of residency
• Local community programs
• Barangay health services
• Local dispute resolution
• Community monitoring
barangay_1a_poblacion.notes: Local barangay office for District 1 residents

davao_city_hall.name: Davao City Hall - Mayor's Office
davao_city_hall.servicesOffered:
• City government services
• Public assistance programs
• City ordinance information
• Public safety services
• Urban planning services
• Public health programs

philhealth_davao.name: PhilHealth Davao City Office
philhealth_davao.servicesOffered:
• Health insurance enrollment
• Member data update
• Premium payment assistance
• Claims processing
• Senior citizen health benefits
• Indigent program enrollment
philhealth_davao.notes: Health insurance services for senior citizens
